# Hate-Speech vorhersagen

## Verwendete Pakete


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
-- Attaching core tidyverse packages ------------------------ tidyverse 2.0.0 --
v dplyr     1.1.4     v readr     2.1.4
v forcats   1.0.0     v stringr   1.5.1
v ggplot2   3.4.4     v tibble    3.2.1
v lubridate 1.9.3     v tidyr     1.3.0
v purrr     1.0.1     
-- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() --
x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
x dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
i Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tokenizers)
library(tidytext)
library(hcandersenr)
library(SnowballC)  # Stemming
library(lsa)        # Stopwörter
library(easystats)  # Komfort für deskriptive Statistiken, wie `describe_distribution`
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
# Attaching packages: easystats 0.7.0 (red = needs update)
v bayestestR  0.13.1   v correlation 0.8.4 
v datawizard  0.9.1    v effectsize  0.8.6 
x insight     0.19.7   v modelbased  0.8.6 
v performance 0.10.8   v parameters  0.21.3
v report      0.5.8    v see         0.8.1 

Restart the R-Session and update packages with `easystats::easystats_update()`.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(textclean)  # Emojis ersetzen
library(wordcloud)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Lade nötiges Paket: RColorBrewer
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(textplot)   # Vizzzz
library(textdata)   # Worteinbettungen, vorgekocht
library(widyr)      # Ähnlichkeit berechnen mit widyr_svd
library(slider)     # slide
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

Attache Paket: 'slider'

Das folgende Objekt ist maskiert 'package:datawizard':

    slide
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(entropy)    # Entropie berechnen
```

```

Attache Paket: 'entropy'

Das folgende Objekt ist maskiert 'package:lsa':

    entropy
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
```

```
-- Attaching packages -------------------------------------- tidymodels 1.1.1 --
v broom        1.0.5     v tune         1.1.2
v dials        1.2.0     v workflows    1.1.3
v infer        1.0.5     v workflowsets 1.0.1
v modeldata    1.2.0     v yardstick    1.2.0
v rsample      1.2.0     
-- Conflicts ----------------------------------------- tidymodels_conflicts() --
x scales::discard()        masks purrr::discard()
x recipes::discretize()    masks entropy::discretize()
x dplyr::filter()          masks stats::filter()
x recipes::fixed()         masks stringr::fixed()
x yardstick::get_weights() masks insight::get_weights()
x dplyr::lag()             masks stats::lag()
x yardstick::mae()         masks performance::mae()
x parsnip::null_model()    masks insight::null_model()
x infer::p_value()         masks parameters::p_value()
x tune::parameters()       masks dials::parameters(), parameters::parameters()
x yardstick::rmse()        masks performance::rmse()
x dials::smoothness()      masks discrim::smoothness(), datawizard::smoothness()
x yardstick::spec()        masks readr::spec()
x recipes::step()          masks stats::step()
* Use tidymodels_prefer() to resolve common conflicts.
```
